imdb.plot outline: LUCID is an edgy sci-fi thriller following Charlie's Virtual Reality therapy after she is sexually assaulted on a girls night out. The series will explore topical issues such as sexual assault, addiction, and therapy within this dystopian world and in Virtual Reality. As Charlie becomes addicted to the way she feels in VR she becomes less attached to the real world her friends are desperately fighting to bring her back to. Will her friends save her before it's too late?
imdb.title: LUCID
plot: _LUCID_ (qv) is an edgy sci-fi thriller following Charlie's Virtual Reality therapy after she is sexually assaulted on a girls night out. The series will explore topical issues such as sexual assault, addiction, and therapy within this dystopian world and in Virtual Reality. As Charlie becomes addicted to the way she feels in VR she becomes less attached to the real world her friends are desperately fighting to bring her back to. Will her friends save her before it's too late?
